titleStmt.title: The victorious reigne of King Edvvard the Third Written in seven bookes. By his Majesties command.
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale?] for T. Walkley, and B. Fisher, and are to bee sold at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Edvvard the third.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
